function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of copper-coated surfaces for mitigating SARS-CoV-2 propagation.","Impact":"Potential impact on the viricidal activity of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of the copper-coated surfaces.","Technologies":"Surface coating technology for copper deposition.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Facility managers and maintenance staff."}]}
